title: Drosophila Evolution in a Lab Set Member 1

content.question: Which of the following best represents the null hypothesis for the experiment detailed in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: The mating preferences of flies are not dependent on the nutrient source on which they are grown.
Prolonged exposure to a different diet can change behavior in fruit flies.
When crossed, flies grown on the same medium will not produce viable offspring.
Growing flies in a confined chamber will not create a barrier to mating in fruit flies.

content.answer: The mating preferences of flies are not dependent on the nutrient source on which they are grown.

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
